message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $12,000. I believe it's a great value for you, and I'm confident you'll see the benefits. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is just too low. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go any lower than $10,500. It's still a great deal for a product worth $10,000 to you. Let's meet in the middle and make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,250. Can you consider this compromise?
